Attribute: customerID: The ID of the customer
tenure: The time for which a customer has been using the service
PhoneService: If a customer has opted for the phone service or not
Contract: If a customer has opted for a one year, a two year or a month-to-month contract
PaperlessBilling: If a customer has opted for a paperless billing service or not
PaymentMethod: The type of payment method a customer has opted for
MonthlyCharges: Specifies the money paid by a customer each month.
TotalCharges: The total money paid by the customer to the company.
gender: The gender of the customer. (0 if Female, 1 if Male)
SeniorCitizen: If a customer is a senior citizen or not
Partner: If a customer is married/ in a live-in relationship.
Dependents: If a customer has family members who depend on him/her for financial support
MultipleLines: Whether a customer has multiple lines of internet connectivity.
InternetService: The type of internet service provider a customer has opted for
OnlineSecurity: If a customer has setup an online security or not
OnlineBackup: If a customer has chosen an online backup option or not
DeviceProtection: If a customer has chosen a device protection feature or not
TechSupport: If a customer has chosen a technical support feature or not
StreamingTV: If a customer has chosen a TV streaming service or not
StreamingMovies: If a customer has chosen a movie streaming service or not
Churn: Whether a customer has churned, i.e. left the company or not (0 if not churn, 1 if churn)
